abstract.text: The most frequently asked questions about FreemiumKit.
If your app crashes upon app start, it’s likely that your app can’t find the FreemiumKit SDK path. Learn how to fix your build settings.

doc://FreemiumKit/documentation/Freemium.title: My Mac app is crashing on start on TestFlight / during App Review – how to fix?

abstract.text: Learn why you can trust FreemiumKit to scale with your app and why there’s no long-term lock-in risk for your app.

doc://FreemiumKit/documentation/Freemium.title: How does FreemiumKit work? Can I trust it?

abstract.text: This checklist helps developers using FreemiumKit to navigate Apple’s app review process for apps with in-app purchases (IAPs).
Learn how FreemiumKit deals with validation and how it helps you focus on what’s important – your app’s features!
Learn how to use our built-in parental gate for apps ‘Made for Kids’ to comply with Apples guidelines and avoid accidental purchases by small children.

doc://FreemiumKit/documentation/Freemium.title: Are ‘Made for Kids’ apps supported with a Parental Gate?

abstract.text: See how easy it is to migrate from RevenueCat with our detailed migration guide – takes only ~30 minutes (including read time).

doc://FreemiumKit/documentation/Freemium.title: I use RevenueCat, how can I migrate?

abstract.text: Learn how FreemiumKit allows you to mark purchases as ‘legacy’ and how the SDK ensures existing customers can continue to use your app as expected.

doc://FreemiumKit/documentation/Freemium.title: How can I disable old products without customers losing access?

abstract.text: Learn how FreemiumKit was designed to keep your users data private and reduce the exposure of your purchase data to a minimum.

doc://FreemiumKit/documentation/Freemium.title: How does FreemiumKit handle User Privacy?

abstract.text: Learn how to set up your app for our paywalls and live push notifications.
See how easy it is to migrate from a paid-up-front app to the Freemium model using FreemiumKit, while preserving access to your app for those who already purchased.

doc://FreemiumKit/documentation/Freemium.title: My app is paid-up-front. How can I make it Freemium?

abstract.text: Learn how to migrate from a paid-up-front app to the Freemium model using FreemiumKit in 3 simple steps, while preserving access to your app for those who already purchased.
Learn how we calculate your monthly income and what happens if you exceed your current plan.

doc://FreemiumKit/documentation/Freemium.title: How does the Pricing work in detail?

abstract.text: Simple In-App Purchases and Subscriptions for Apple Platforms:
Automation, Paywalls, A/B Testing, Live Notifications, PPP, and more.
Learn how you can recognize a purchased user across app installs and devices to roll your own server-side logic for custom limits.
